description.ko: 인공 조명의 불빛이 결코 꺼지지 않고 모든 골목마다 디지털 비밀이 숨겨져 있는 고도의 기술과 거친 삶이 공존하는 대도시를 경험해 보세요.
description.en: Immerse yourself in a high-tech, low-life metropolis where the glow of artificial lights never fades and every alleyway hides a digital secret.

prompt: A sprawling cyberpunk megacity at night, cinematic lighting, rain-slicked asphalt reflecting vibrant neon signs in magenta and cyan, towering skyscrapers with holographic advertisements, flying vehicles weaving through dense urban canyons, hyper-realistic, 8k resolution, futuristic noir aesthetic.
